channel.title: repo on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in repo on SpiderSoft

item.title: PHP 5.4.x on CentOS 6.5
item.description: Quick copy and paste list of commands to get PHP 5.4 on CentOS boxes Enable remi repo sudo nano /etc/yum.repos.d/remi.repo Update sudo yum update done… now you can follow these instructions to install LAMP stack

item.title: CentOS 6.2 php-mcrypt and EPEL repo
item.description: You will find plenty of “how-to” tutorials, but usually with not working url to EPEL repo. So this is mine: yum install http://download.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/6/x86_64/epel-release-6-7.noarch.rpm yum update yum install php-mcrypt
